ThingDef.label: heart
ThingDef.description: A biological heart. Pumps blood around the body. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: lung
ThingDef.description: A biological lung. A pair of these form the core of the respiratory system. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: kidney
ThingDef.description: A biological kidney. Filters and removes waste products from the blood. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: liver
ThingDef.description: A biological liver. Plays an important role in metabolism. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: brain cells
ThingDef.description: A biological brain cells. The main core of almost all organic life. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: stomach
ThingDef.description: A biological stomach. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: leg
ThingDef.description: A biological leg. Lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: foot
ThingDef.description: A biological foot. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: toe
ThingDef.description: A biological toe. Part of foot that helps you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: shoulder
ThingDef.description: A biological shoulder. Lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: arm
ThingDef.description: A biological arm. Lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: hand
ThingDef.description: A biological hand. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: finger
ThingDef.description: A biological finger. Part of hand that helps you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: eye
ThingDef.description: A biological eye. Absorbs light, which lets a person to see. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: ear
ThingDef.description: A biological ear. Picks up vibrations, allowing people to hear sound. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: nose
ThingDef.description: A biological nose. The finishing touch to a face. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.

ThingDef.label: jaw
ThingDef.description: A biological jaw. Allow people to eat and socializing. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
